author: joeswatosh
msg: Give up trying to track how many times and with what values the validator
is going to be called by svn_wc_relocate3, only assert that it is invoked.
* subversion/bindings/swig/ruby/test/test_wc.rb
(SvnTestWc#test_relocate): Remove the assertion about the exact values that
are passed to the relocation validator, only assert that the validator
been invoked.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Prefer the block form of methods that access the repository or working
copy directly to ensure that all handles will be closed by the time the
TestCase#teardown is invoked.  This should help prevent one test from
interfering with the next.
* subversion/bindings/swig/ruby/test/test_repos.rb
(SvnReposTest#assert_commit_editor): Use the block form of
SvnTestUtil#make_context.
(SvnReposTest#test_load): Use the block form of Svn::Repos.create.

author: gstein
msg: Some simple cleanups: use standard variable names, constify some params
and variables, and remove some access batons.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c:
(process_committed_leaf): use ADM_ABSPATH instead of ADM_ACCESS.
constify the QUEUE param. rename POOL to SCRATCH_POOL. rename LOGTAGS
to LOG_ACCUM.
(process_committed_internal): use ADM_ABSPATH instead of ADM_ACCESS.
constify the QUEUE param. rename POOL to SCRATCH_POOL. rename SUBPOOL
to ITERPOOL.
(svn_wc_process_committed_queue): constify the CQI localvar, and adjust
calling params
(svn_wc_process_committed4): adjust calling params to
process_committed_internal()

author: gstein
msg: Detail all the possible STATUS values that are returned by read_info().
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.h:
(svn_wc__db_read_info): expand the docstring to describe each of the
resulting status values and the cause(s) of that status

author: gstein
msg: Ensure that we operate upon the proper work queue. If a subdirectory is
missing, then its queue does not exist (when using per-dir metadata).
Adjust the work queue functions to detect this situation, and compensate
accordingly.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c:
(svn_wc__db_wq_add, svn_wc__db_wq_fetch, svn_wc__db_wq_completed):
detect when a subdir is missing, and handle the operation a little bit
differently. surround this with SINGLE_DB ifndef/endif markers, so we
know it will not be required when a single db is used.
